name: Avoid using Main Procedures not having the same name as the file name (PL1)
description: This rule searches for all the PL1 Main Procedures that have a different name than the file name.
output:
The report lists all the PL1 Main Procedures not having the same name as the file name.

It provides following information: 
- PL1 Main Procedures full name
rationale: For readability aspects, naming conventions must be respected.
remediation: The main procedure must have the same name as the file.
